Articles.Content:
So there's a bug with the stock temperature gauges which explains why my game consistently crashes whenever I try to fly my SSTOs into orbit.

There's a mod http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120731 that disables them, but I still need to know how hot my plane parts get.

Are there any mods that add alternative temperature gauges?

Thermal Monitor adds temperature and heating rate to right click menu

Heat Warning gives you alarms when parts start reaching high temperatures

Critical Temperature Gauge displays the temperature of the part closest to exploding graphically
Oh, thanks! I found Thermal Monitor, but wasn't what I wanted. Those other two are good
